feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 08:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -6.2°C
Wind: E 19 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
